sources.title: ORIX Begins First Biofuel Trial in Maritime Operations to Cut CO2 Emissions
sources.snippet: 68. ORIX Corporation (ORIX) has announced an exciting new development in its ongoing sustainability efforts. The company will conduct a sea trial using biofuels aboard an ORIX-owned vessel that is currently chartered by Dampskibsselskabet NORDEN A/S. This marks the first time ORIX will utilize biofuels in its owned vessel operations.

sources.snippet: The trial will the first time for ORIX to use biofuels on the owned vessel, specifically a fuel composed of a mix of conventional heavy fuel oil and biofuels made from waste cooking oils. queries.query: Orix Corp fossil fuel financing controversies
queries.rationale: Investigate criticisms and controversies related to Orix's financing activities in fossil fuels despite its renewable energy investments.
Examine any legal or regulatory challenges Orix has faced across different jurisdictions, focusing on compliance with financial regulations.
Look into any reported incidents of data security breaches or concerns regarding the protection of client information in Orix's digital transformation efforts.
